message.content: {"given_definition_quality":30,"better_definition":"north; northern direction","sentence":"北风在吹。","image_prompt":"A visual of a soft, animated wind blowing from the north in a quiet, slightly post-apocalyptic landscape. The sky is muted, cast in cool tones, with swirling leaves carried by the wind toward the south. The mood is gentle but haunting, with distant silhouettes of barren trees and empty fields under a pale sun. Visualize the wind movement to clearly suggest it comes from the north, in a soft apocalypse animation style.","sentence_translation":"The north wind is blowing."}
